'''Automatons''' are enemies that are mechanical in nature. The majority of Automatons are [[Ruin Machines]], although Automatons of different origin exist.

==Types==
{{Enemy Table}}

===Ruin Machines===
{{Main|Ruin Machines}}
Most automatons are Ruin Machines, which are divided into the [[Humanoid Ruin Machines]] and the [[Ruin Sentinels]]. These war machines are often found patrolling ruins, remnants from the fallen nation of [[Khaenri'ah]]. They mostly deal {{Color|Physical DMG}} and are highly resistant against said damage type.

===Primal Constructs===
{{Main|Primal Construct}}

Primal Constructs are a form of automatons that were developed by [[King Deshret]]'s civilization. They mostly deal {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

===Clockwork Meka===
{{Main|Clockwork Meka}}

Clockwork Meka are a form of automatons developed by [[Fontaine]]. They deal {{Color|Physical DMG}}, but are imbued with [[Arkhe]] in the form of '''Ousia''' or '''Pneuma''' which enhances their attacks to deal Elemental DMG and/or alters their attack style.

===Secret Source Automatons===
{{Main|Secret Source Automaton}}

Secret Source Automatons are a form of automatons created by an ancient civilization in [[Natlan]]. They primarily deal Elemental DMG and will prepare a stronger attack when they sense a character using [[Nightsoul's Blessing]] against them.
